title: Beenade
summaries: Beenades are consumable ranged weapons that can be dropped by the Queen Bee boss or crafted on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version using Grenades and Bee Wax. They act similarly to regular Grenades, but release 15–25 friendly bee projectiles upon exploding that home in on enemies. These bee projectiles deal 100% base damage ( 12 / 14 base damage) each.
